title: Magic City Marketplace: A Snapshot of the Convention and Event Businesss
teaser: Birmingham did not win the 2016 Democratic National Convention.  Nor has it hosted an NCAA basketball tournament game in years.  But players in Birmingham's tourism and convention industry are working to keep a steady stream of events through the city.  We have a snapshot of that industry in this week's Magic City Marketplace.
